Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 23rd overall pick, by Coney Island in 1980...
Traded from Coney Island to Pittsburgh on 7/21/1982 (Going to CI: P C. Benson. Going to PIT: P D. Castrejon, LF H. Mendoza, P P. Gibson)...
Had first career hit (triple) on 4/1/1983, off Forrest Brewer (Mal)...
Hit first career homerun on 7/12/1984, off Walter Gonzalas (Min)...
Won World Championship with Pittsburgh in 1986...
Signed as a free agent by Syracuse on 2/20/1989 to a 4-year deal worth $2,750,000 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/23/1989, hitting .448 with 2 HR, 10 RBI...
